name: ACTİON_MOVİE
description:
CONTROLS

W, A, S,  D move

SPACE jump

LEFT  CLİCK shoot

MOUSE rotate the gun

MOVİE STORY

This man has a illegal books in his house. So the enemies are coming to hunt him. Can they hunt him? OR will he survive?

STORY

This man has to perform in a action film. So he is trying to film the scene.

EXPLANATİON

all the art is made by me.

music and sound effects also made by me.
